collector.informationSubtitle: Enter the collection information about this seedlot
collector.checkboxText: Use applicant agency as collector agency
collector.acronymErrorMsg: Please enter a valid acronym that identifies the agency
collector.locationErrorMsg: This location code is not valid for the selected agency, please enter a valid one or change the agency
collector.numOfContainerErrorMsg: Invalid entry. Number must be between 0 and 10,000 and up to 3 decimal places.
collector.volOfConesErrorMsg: The total volume of cones does not equal, please note that this value must be the "Volume per container" x "Number of containers"

ownership.title: Ownership
ownership.subtitle: Enter the seedlot's ownership information, the agencies listed as owners are the ones who are charged for cone and seed processing fees
ownership.ownerAgencyError: Please enter a valid acronym that identifies the agency
ownership.ownerAgencyValidationError: Agency validation failed. Please retry verification
ownership.locationCodeError: This location code is not valid for the selected agency, please enter a valid one or change the agency
ownership.ownerPortionSumError: The sum of all owner portions must add up to 100
ownership.ownerPortionAboveLimitError: Value must be lower or equal to 100
ownership.ownerPortionBelowLimitError: Value must be higher or equal to 0
ownership.ownerPortionDecimalError: Value can have up to 2 decimal places
ownership.reservedAboveLimitError: Value must be lower or equal to 100
ownership.reservedBelowLimitError: Value must be higher or equal to 0
ownership.reservedDecimalError: Value can have up to 2 decimal places
